name: Calling Siren Head
description:
A 5-Minute horror game. Collect the communication devices, and place them on the pedestals.

This is my first project I've completed using RPG Maker. Can you beat it? :)

Arrow keys: Move | Z: Accept | Shift: Run

Tip: You can enable 'Auto Dash' in the Options menu, to save you holding the Shift key. ^^
